name: It's Time for Exam!
description:
Oh no! The Exam is coming and you're not ready! And there is always not enough money... It's seems like you will have a challenge these days!

Study, work, sleep, repeat. A familiar situation, right? Two weeks left to the Exam which will change your destiny! You should balance between working and studying these days, but don't forget to sleep! Will you be able to pass the hell waiting for you?
